item.title: All 8 Towns In The Nightmare Before Christmas Explained
item.description: The world of The Nightmare Before Christmas is incredibly imaginative as it brings the holidays to life, but what's behind each of the holiday doors?

item.title: Netflix's One Piece Found the Perfect Gol D. Roger (and Here's Why)
item.description: Michael Dorman was the perfect choice for the Netflix live-action One Piece because he has real family connections in his love for the series.

item.title: The Monsterverse Can Finally Fulfill A Dream Matchup Godzilla's Movies Cancelled Twice
item.description: Toho canceled two plans to pit Godzilla against one of his allies, but the Monsterverse could head in a different direction with the pair.
